description: {"blocks":[{"key":"e1c19","text":"This protocol describes a one-pot GoldenGate assembly of a new dual-guide targeting plasmid (pCas9-Duo) expressing two distinct guide RNAs in order to enhance the chances of a successful Cas9-mediated modification at a target region in Plasmodium falciparum. Designed as part of SHIFTiKO (frameshift-based trackable inducible knockout) system1 (based on2).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":236,"length":21},{"style":"sup","offset":342,"length":1},{"style":"sup","offset":353,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

funders.funder_name: European Society of Clinical Microbiology and Infectious Diseases
